EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Native Roadshow_2017.London Post Event
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for spending the day with us
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for being a part of the Cloud-Native Roadshow in London. We hope our event provided you with a clear perspective on the process and technology it takes to become a cloud-native organization.
We have made the presentation slides available for you:
- Cloud-Native Landscape <[[https://content.pivotal.io/slides/cloud-native-roadshow-landscape-london?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]> - Cloud-Native Roadshow Microservices <[[https://content.pivotal.io/slides/cloud-native-roadshow-microservices-london?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]> - Google Cloud Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/slides/cloud-native-roadshow-google-london?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]> - Solace Messaging for Open Data Movement <[[https://content.pivotal.io/slides/cloud-native-roadshow-solace-london?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]> - New Relic Resources <[[https://content.pivotal.io/slides/cloud-native-roadshow-new-relic-london?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>
In an effort to improve on events like this in the future, please take this brief survey <[[http://pivotal.cnr-london.sgizmo.com/s3/]]>.
If you are interested in having Pivotal present cloud-native <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]> content to your organization or want to learn more about Pivotal, contact us at cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io]]> to schedule a follow up with our team.
Thank you again for joining us! The Pivotal Team
For more in depth presentations on cloud-native topics and everything else to do with delivering software, please join us again at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>, taking place December 4 - 7, 2017 in San Francisco. Use the code below for $100 off registration! S1P_EVENT_CNR100 <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>
